item.description:
2/27/10 Update: We have reserved the private room at Bugaboo for this meeting, so please bring your ideas, your experience and your laughter and come join us in kicking this off.




Do you like to get involved and do community service projects? Do you like to help others in need?

Donna & I want to have at least one Community Service project per year within the group. We would like to have this kickoff for anyone who is interested in getting involved and doing their part.

Whether its participating in a walk-a-thon, volunteering for an event, going to a Nursing home or to a Children's organization.....Every little bit helps in the current state of the economy.

Lets get together, have some dinner and throw some ideas out on the table. If you know others that want to get involved, please feel free to bring them along.

Once we have an idea of how many there will be in attendance, we will announce the location of this event.

Please consider joining us on this very special planning event.

Can't make it to the event but want to get involved, please contact Janet or Donna thru this site.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Janet or the Private Function Room
item.name: Community Service Project Kickoff
